mapper.update:
update A_AGENT_QUIT
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUIT_PLATFORM = #{quitPlatform,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAPITAL_DEBT = #{capitalDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_DEBT = #{orderDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROFIT_DEBT = #{profitDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENT_DEPT = #{agentDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPP_TYPE = #{suppType,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUPP_DEPT = #{suppDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REALITY_SUPP_DEPT = #{realitySuppDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENT_OWE_TICKET = #{agentOweTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPP_TICKET = #{suppTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUBTRACT_AMT = #{subtractAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MIGRATION_PLATFORM = #{migrationPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_STATUS = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REFUND_AMT_STATUS = #{refundAmtStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REFUND_AMT_DEADLINE = #{refundAmtDeadline,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPROVE_TIME = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLO_REVIEW_STATUS = #{cloReviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QUIT_BUS_ID = #{quitBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_REFUND = #{appRefund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update A_AGENT_QUIT set AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUIT_PLATFORM = #{quitPlatform,jdbcType=CHAR}, CAPITAL_DEBT = #{capitalDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_DEBT = #{orderDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROFIT_DEBT = #{profitDebt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_DEPT = #{agentDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPP_TYPE = #{suppType,jdbcType=CHAR}, SUPP_DEPT = #{suppDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REALITY_SUPP_DEPT = #{realitySuppDept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_OWE_TICKET = #{agentOweTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPP_TICKET = #{suppTicket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBTRACT_AMT = #{subtractAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MIGRATION_PLATFORM = #{migrationPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_STATUS = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUND_AMT_STATUS = #{refundAmtStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REFUND_AMT_DEADLINE = #{refundAmtDeadline,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPROVE_TIME = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLO_REVIEW_STATUS = #{cloReviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QUIT_BUS_ID = #{quitBusId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_REFUND = #{appRefund,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
